title: The Woman in Question = Five Angles on Murder
creator_credit: Anthony Asquith, Teddy Baird and Javelin Films
brief_description: After a fortune teller is found murdered, five people relate totally different impressions of the murdered woman to the police. These impressions help the police to discover the killer’s identity. Starring Dirk Bogarde.
